value.fullName: Reimbursable expenses shall be invoiced by Bynder to Customer within one (1) month of the last day of travel.
value.label: Reimbursable expenses shall be invoiced by Bynder to Customer within one (1) month of the last day of travel.

value.fullName: Reimbursable expenses shall be invoiced by Bynder to Customer within seven (7) days of the last day of travel.
value.label: Reimbursable expenses shall be invoiced by Bynder to Customer within seven (7) days of the last day of travel.
